item.title: 5th person dies after Legionnaires’ disease outbreak sickens dozens in New York City
item.description: A fifth person has died in connection with a Legionnaires’ disease outbreak in New York City

item.title: Florida man convicted of killing woman abducted from office is set to be executed
item.description: A man convicted of kidnapping a woman from an insurance office in the early 1980s and killing her is set for execution in Florida
